citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 a.m. on
08/05/2015.
Upon arrival at the facility contact was made with the licensee's spouse and she stated that the licensee was
unavailable for inspection.
End of report.
